messages.title: A Better Voice for Bury North
messages.content: A Better Choice for Bury North

messages.title: What has David Nuttall ever done for you?
messages.content: Vote him out on 8th June and I won’t let you down.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: NHS and front line council services
keyPolicies.policyDescription: £100 million cut from NHS Bury and front line council services – voted for by David Nuttall
Hospital and GP waiting times have soared – voted for by David Nuttall
Face closure – a closure David Nuttall supports
Insecure work and poverty pay is commonplace
Opportunities for young people are disappearing

mentions.tacticalSituation: We lost by just 378 votes then.

issues.health: £100 million cut from NHS Bury and front line council services – voted for by David Nuttall
issues.labourEmployment: Insecure work and poverty pay is commonplace

community.content: Bury’s Walk-in centres face closure – a closure David Nuttall supports

leaflet.personalStatement: Many of you know me. I live here with my young family. My wife, Nikki, runs her business here. Our kids go to school in Rammy. I love our town but David Nuttall has got to go. Our families deserve better. Our businesses deserve better. Our schools deserve better. Your bus services better. If you elect me, you’ll be my boss, not any party leader in Westminster. I’ll be a strong independent-minded MP who’ll stand up for you no matter who’s in charge.

quotes.text: Has life in Bury improved after two terms of David Nuttall and the Tories? Have we got the best MP available to us?

images.caption: With my wife Nikki and three children Jemima, Henry, Lizzie and another on the way!

examples: More than 18,000 of you voted for me last time.
We lost by just 378 votes then.
£100 million cut from NHS Bury and front line council services – voted for by David Nuttall
I love our town but David Nuttall has got to go.
Bury’s Walk-in centres face closure – a closure David Nuttall supports
